alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison and central Gallatin Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 528 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 25 miles south of Ennis, or 26 miles northwest of Henrys Lake, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Madison and central Gallatin Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
